sentences.en: But not everyone is welcoming the jamboree.
sentences.cn: 不过并非人人都欢迎迪士尼乐园的到来.

sentences.en: the movie industry's annual jamboree at Cannes
sentences.cn: 在戛纳举行的一年一度的影展

sentences.en: Unfortunately, we can't go to the jamboree.
sentences.cn: 不幸地是，我们不能去庆祝会。

trans.tran_cn: 狂欢活动，大型童子军集会
trans.tran_en: a big noisy party or event
